alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Gates; Hertford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:36PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bertie, Hertford and central Gates Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 536 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cofield, or 7 miles northeast of Ahoskie. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ahoskie, Aulander, Gatesville, Winton, Cofield, Powellsville, Colerain, Harrellsville, Como, Roduco, Union, Tunis, Earleys, Newsome Store, Chowan Beach, Topsy, Buckland, Carter, Wakelon and Bartonsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
